content.text:
# Timperley (ward)

| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Timperley was an electoral ward of Trafford, Greater Manchester, covering the western part of Timperley.
Councillors
File:blank.png|Will Frass (Liberal Democrat)
File:blank.png|Meena Minnis (Liberal Democrat)
